name: Forestry
description: So it begins. Your dreams of being lost in the woods have come to life! Chop down trees, sit by the lake, find the secrets, build a fortress, impress your friends, and master the skills required for making your way in the world. Welcome to Forestry.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 SP1 Processor: Intel® i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or greater Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
